description: Application for removal of conditions 7 (Landscaping) and 12 (Bore Hole method statement) of Full Planning application Ref: P121038
site_name: Land And Pathway Adjacent To 6 Montague Court
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Original approved plans under P121038:

St Clements Street (design and access statement); 2012-276-02-101; 2012-276-02-105; 2012-276-02-106; 2012-276-02-107; 2012-276-02-108; 2012-276-02-109; 2012-276-02-110 (as amended 28.9.2012); 2012-276-02-111 (as amended 28.9.2012); 2012-276-02-112; 2012-276-02-113; 2012-276-02-114; 2012-276-02-200; 2012-276-02-201; 2012-276-02-202; 2012-276-02-203; 2012-276-02-204; 2012-276-02-205; 2012-276-02-206; 2012-276-02-207; 2012-276-02-301.

Approved plans under P2015/2064/FUL:

Landscaping plan ref: 1501 rev. P.02, Method Statement/Risk Assessment prepared by Chelmer Site Investigations dated 22nd October 2013, Document Review Notice by Network Rail dated 01/11/2013 and signed by Naz Mohamad

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
